column5: I am renting out an extra room, the house is 5 minutes from the freeway and 20 mins from Houston, the house is 2400 sq ft 3 bedrooms 2 bath, 2 bedrooms on one side of the house and master bedroom is on the other side of the house. I do have two small dogs, a Westie and Maltese, they love people and they do have boundaries within the house, my current roommate can vouch for them being good dogs.
column8: Perfect set up for an out of town worker
